meanings.definition: In a stingy or frugal manner.
meanings.sent1: She saved her allowance parsimoniously, only spending it on necessities.
meanings.sent2: He managed his budget parsimoniously, always looking for the best deals.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel collected acorns parsimoniously, hiding them in various spots around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The old man guarded his secrets parsimoniously, revealing them only to a select few.
meanings.sent5: The teacher distributed the art supplies parsimoniously, ensuring each student received just enough.
